heroSection.title:
Everything
you need in
one place. [VARIANT1]
heroSection.description: Create links and landing pages that direct fans to listen to your music in the right service, save your music, pre-save, follow, subscribe, buy tickets, enter a contest or connect it all together in your Artist Bio Link.

allLinksComeWith.title: You should know that all our smart links come with:

description.desktop: We automatically find your music in popular music services like Spotify, Apple Music, Amazon and more to create your link in seconds. You can choose from hundreds of additional services or add your own.
Learn how your fans get to your music and understand key behavioral insights to make smarter marketing decisions. Connect your data to retargeting and 3rd party data platforms
Maintain all of your fan contacts. Easily manage all of your fan contacts, collected in an intuitive fan database to keep control of fan contact info, activity and demographics.

title.desktop: A single link that connects fans to all of your content

description.desktop: A Link in Bio made for music. Connect fans to your latest release, video, merch, tour, website, press coverage from all of your social media bios. Add any button type you need:

title.desktop: The fastest way for fans to consume your music

description.desktop: A smart music link that automatically routes fans to your released music in the services they already use and tracks everything you need to grow your streams.

topCapabilites.capability: Automatically finds your music in popular services
Convert your pre-release music links automatically on release day
Customize by country with geo-aware links and language localization

title.desktop: Build hype and maximize your streams on release day

description.desktop: Market your music to fans ahead of your release date. Get fans to Pre-Save your music and guarantee streams, follows and playlist adds from day one.

topCapabilites.capability: Your music saved automatically on release day
Grow artist follows and playlist additions in one click

description.desktop: Automated Smart Podcast Links connect listeners to your podcast in their favorite audio platform.

title.desktop: Reward your most loyal fans with contests and giveaways

description.desktop: Build fan loyalty with easy-to-create contests that reward your fans with prizes and encourage additional entries for taking actions of your choice.

topCapabilites.capability: Supercharge your growth with music-focused actions

youShouldAlsoCheckOut.title: Two more things you should check out

description.desktop: Become a better music marketer by understanding fan behaviors and preferences across all of your marketing activities. Measure fan interactions, from visits to conversions, and break out data for deeper analysis.
Manage your relationships with your fans like never before, collect fan contact info, get real-time insights and keep your fans notified about your latest drops.
You can use Feature.fm for free or subscribe to one of our paid plans. All paid plans come with a free trial of our Pro plan
